verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon Aijeleth <S%H365><s%> Shahar <S%H7837><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. My 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, my 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, why hast thou forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me? why art thou so far <S%H7350><s%> from helping <S%H3444><s%> me, and from the words <S%H1697><s%> of my roaring <S%H7581><s%> ?

O my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, I cry <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the daytime <S%H3119><s%>, but thou hearest <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not; and in the night season <S%H3915><s%>, and am not silent <S%H1747><s%>.
But thou art holy <S%H6918><s%>, O thou that inhabitest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
Our fathers <S%H1><s%> trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thee: they trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thou didst deliver <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them.
They cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, and were delivered <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: they trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thee, and were not confounded <S%H954><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
But I am a worm <S%H8438><s%>, and no man <S%H376><s%>; a reproach <S%H2781><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, and despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

All they that see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me laugh me to scorn <S%H3932><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: they shoot out <S%H6358><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the lip <S%H8193><s%>, they shake <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%>, saying,

He trusted <S%H1556><s%> <S%H8800><s%> on the YY <S%H3068><s%> that he would deliver <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him: let him deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, seeing he delighted <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in him.

But thou art he that took <S%H1518><s%> <S%H8801><s%> me out of the womb <S%H990><s%>: thou didst make me hope <S%H982><s%> <S%H8688><s%> when I was upon my mother's <S%H517><s%> breasts <S%H7699><s%>.
I was cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8717><s%> upon thee from the womb <S%H7358><s%>: thou art my 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> from my mother's <S%H517><s%> belly <S%H990><s%>.
Be not far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me; for trouble <S%H6869><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%>; for there is none to help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> have compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me: strong <S%H47><s%> bulls of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> have beset me round <S%H3803><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.
They gaped <S%H6475><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon me with their mouths <S%H6310><s%>, as a ravening <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and a roaring <S%H7580><s%> <S%H8802><s%> lion <S%H738><s%>.

I am poured out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8738><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%>, and all my bones <S%H6106><s%> are out of joint <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8694><s%>: my heart <S%H3820><s%> is like wax <S%H1749><s%>; it is melted <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my bowels <S%H4578><s%>.

My strength <S%H3581><s%> is dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8804><s%> like a potsherd <S%H2789><s%>; and my tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8716><s%> to my jaws <S%H4455><s%>; and thou hast brought <S%H8239><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me into the dust <S%H6083><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>.

For dogs <S%H3611><s%> have compassed <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me: the assembly <S%H5712><s%> of the wicked <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8688><s%> have inclosed <S%H5362><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me: they pierced <S%H3738><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H738><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> and my feet <S%H7272><s%>.
I may tell <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all my bones <S%H6106><s%>: they look <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8686><s%> and stare <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon me.
They part <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my garments <S%H899><s%> among them, and cast <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8686><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> upon my vesture <S%H3830><s%>.
But be not thou far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>: O my strength <S%H360><s%>, haste <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee to help <S%H5833><s%> me.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8685><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%>; my darling <S%H3173><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the dog <S%H3611><s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me from the lion's <S%H738><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>: for thou hast heard <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me from the shofars <S%H7161><s%> of the unicorns <S%H7214><s%>.

I will declare <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> unto my brethren <S%H251><s%>: in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the congregation <S%H6951><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee.

Ye that fear <S%H3373><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8761><s%> him; all ye the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, glorify <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8761><s%> him; and fear <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him, all ye the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

For he hath not despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8804><s%> nor abhorred <S%H8262><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the affliction <S%H6039><s%> of the afflicted <S%H6041><s%>; neither hath he hid <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> from him; but when he cried <S%H7768><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto him, he heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
My praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be of thee in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation <S%H6951><s%>: I will pay <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> before them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him.

The meek <S%H6035><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: they shall praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> that seek <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8802><s%> him: your heart <S%H3824><s%> shall live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>.

All the ends <S%H657><s%> of the world <S%H776><s%> shall remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: and all the kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee.
For the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> is the YY'S <S%H3068><s%>: and he is the governor <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

All they that be fat <S%H1879><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%>: all they that go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him: and none can keep alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his own soul <S%H5315><s%>.
A seed <S%H2233><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him; it shall be accounted <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8792><s%> to the YY <S%H136><s%> for a generation <S%H1755><s%>.

They shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shall declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> unto a people <S%H5971><s%> that shall be born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, that he hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this.
